definition: to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: This form will shut down a single database by performing a final checkpoint.
sentences.chinese: 该形式将通过执行最后的检查点来关闭单个数据库。

sentences.english: Research on Checking of DLG Data Quality Based on Rules;
sentences.chinese: 对更改过的数据库进行检查点操作。

sentences.english: When they did, it was Jonathan and his armor-bearer who were not there.
sentences.chinese: 他们一查点，就知道约拿单和拿兵器的人没有在这里。

sentences.english: Racers must obey rules given by the checkpoint managers.
sentences.chinese: 参赛者必须听检查点负责人的话。

sentences.english: When the secondary encounters a checkpoint, it enters a buffering mode.
sentences.chinese: 当次要服务器遇到检查点时，它将进入一种缓冲模式。

sentences.english: This paper makes use of checkpoint method and profile method to evaluate the accuracy of DEM.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用检查点法和剖面法对DEM进行精度评价。

sentences.english: Checkpoints are not blocked by the defragmenter.
sentences.chinese: 检查点没有被碎片整理程序阻塞。

sentences.english: We emphasize on the HA technique of Checkpoint and Process Migration.
sentences.chinese: 着重讨论了检查点和进程迁移两大高可用技术。

sentences.english: You no longer have to set any checkpoint-related parameters.
sentences.chinese: 不再需要设置任何与检查点相关的参数。

sentences.english: A comprehensive list of project deliverables for each checkpoint.
sentences.chinese: 每个检查点的项目可交付性的综合列表。

sentences.english: The car won the race, but its driver came close to being killed.
sentences.chinese: 那辆车赢了比赛，但驾驶员查点被撞死。

sentences.english: The result of the stop-and-copy phase is a checkpoint in itself.
sentences.chinese: 停止与复制阶段的结果本身就是一个检查点。

sentences.english: You can also use the last checkpoint to show the complete integration scenario.
sentences.chinese: 您也可以使用最后一个检查点来显示整个集成场景。

sentences.english: I almost forgot to tell you about the all-day volleyball tournament going on .
sentences.chinese: 我查点忘了告诉你现在全天都在举行排球锦标赛。

sentences.english: A watchpoint halts the debugger when a specific variable is read from or written to.
sentences.chinese: 当读取或写入某个特定变量时，检查点将暂停调试器。

sentences.english: Several were visibly coordinating with military officers, even setting up joint military-civilian checkpoints.
sentences.chinese: 有些明显与军官合作，甚至设立了军民检查点。

definition: to take inventory of and confiscate a criminal's possessions/to search and confiscate (forbidden items)/to raid
to rummage/to look through/to leaf through
to audit accounts/to inspect accounting books
